about_the_game:
Get ready for a thrilling snowboarding adventure! This game lets you ride through 12 exciting tracks filled with jumps, sharp turns, and breathtaking snowy landscapes. Race down steep slopes, carve through icy forests, and discover hidden shortcuts. Perfect for beginners and pros alike, this game brings the fun and challenge of real snowboarding to your screen!

Features:

  • 12 Unique Tracks: Each track offers a different environment and set of challenges, from rugged mountains to smooth forest trails. (1 Track available in Demo. To Unlock all Tracks Buy Full Version.)

  • Easy Controls: Simple, intuitive controls make it easy to learn but challenging to master.

  • Beautiful Winter Environments: Stunning, detailed graphics immerse you in a realistic snowy world.

    Experience the rush of snowboarding

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later required
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 515 7U
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB AMD or NVIDIA Graphic Card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or Later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 6600K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB Nvidia GTX 970 Graphic Card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
